hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #hearts#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #the Sun's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #the Kokiri Sword#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Goron City#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Requiem of Spirit# and #a Game Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Compass#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Wallet#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found in #the Market#.

SFM (Saria).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #hearts#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Zora Scale#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Compass#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Zora Scale#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
